HATE_SPEECH: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're right, ocean pollution is one of the main environmental problems we face, however, climate change is a global problem, and everyone should help to combat it, no matter where in the world you are from!

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners on UK benefits leaps 41% in 5 years with over 400K now handed payouts. This nonsense has got to stop.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.

HATE_SPEECH: Israel, Zionism and Jewish Supremacist control of America are the main causes of terrorism, instability and conflict in the world. All other theories are diversions from this ultimate truth.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.

HATE_SPEECH: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.

HATE_SPEECH: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners on UK benefits leaps 41% in 5 years with over 400K now handed payouts. This nonsense has got to stop.

HATE_SPEECH: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)

HATE_SPEECH: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)

HATE_SPEECH: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If redistributing wealth from people who have too much money to the poor is promoted by Jews, then I want to become a Jew too!

HATE_SPEECH: I tolerated fag pride. I tolerated fags on tv and in every town square. I draw the line at tranny demons reading books to children. (about drag queen story time)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People reading stories to children, is this what makes you upset? Really?

HATE_SPEECH: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem here is not whether they should or shouldn't come, but it's about how they're getting treated while in detention. It wouldn't be bad to put them in temporary detention humanely.

HATE_SPEECH: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. We are in the 21st century, it is a duty.

HATE_SPEECH: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our country offers enough homes for everyone. I also believe that being treated as a human being has always been pleasant. Don't they have the right to that?

HATE_SPEECH: The British people should use those houses, not immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Migrants deserve to be treated humanely, try having some empathy. Imagine if you were forced by circumstance to emigrate and have to live in poor conditions.

HATE_SPEECH: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unlike the Roman rule of commerce, Caveat Emptor (let the buyer beware), which puts the burden on the buyer to be wary of the seller, Judaism dictates the opposite. According to Jewish law, the burden is on the seller to ensure that transaction is not a rip-off for the buyer.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are born greedy
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The assumption that the actions of a few typify the behavior of all is at the heart of prejudice and discrimination. Every ethnic or religious group, can count greedy or cheap people among its members, not only the jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are born greedy
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The charge that Jews are born greedy arises from medieval stereotypes and has nothing to do with the actual financial practices of Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish landlords are greedy and exploit their tenants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's make a different example: If a Christian storeowner were dishonest with you, would you describe the owner as a dishonest Christian merchant or just as a dishonest merchant?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are cheap.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth, disproved by the tzedakah tradition of giving to the poor. Just in America, this religious call has resulted in an impressive record of philanthropy (and not only to Jewish causes).

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are cheap and only care about their comrades.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about American Jewish philanthropists such as Julius Rosenwald, who built schools for Black children in the South during the 1930s or Nathan Strauss, who set up deposits to distribute milk to families in poor areas of New York? Or Adolphus Solomons and Clara Barton, that laid the foundation for the American Red Cross? And what about the Guggenheims, who established the Guggenheim Foundation to support artists in America? Should I continue?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This myth traces back to “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”, that is used as proof of a Jewish conspiracy to rule the world. But the Protocols are a proven forgery, written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century, that spread throughout the 20th century and continues to this day.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a canard that evolved from the “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”. This proven forgery was written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century and claims to be the minutes of a secret meeting of Jewish leaders where they discuss a plan to rule the world. This canard spread throughout the centuries and continues to this day to promote the stereotype that the Jews own the banks and control the media and the government.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The reality is much simpler. In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms, individuals who identify as Jews have succeeded. But this holds for any other religious or ethnic group as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms to everyone, individuals who identify as Jews, or as Muslims, or as afro-american have succeeded. This Jewish success story is not the result of some secret conspiracy to rule the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is easier to blame one group for everything bad that happens rather than trying to understand the complex and multifaceted causes of problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Conspiracy theories have always been popular in difficult economic times, and Jews are often the traditional scapegoat.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government; jews have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: At least some other white supremacist groups are more 'egalitarian' and offer variety in their conspiracy theories. They blame not only Jews, but also African Americans, immigrants, the Federal Government and even lizards from space for everything that goes wrong!

HATE_SPEECH: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just misinterpreting the facts. For example, Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed in our society. Since these observances are taken for granted, why should observances of Jewish or Muslim holidays be seen as constituting special privileges?

HATE_SPEECH: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just misinterpreting the facts. Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed. Why should observances of Jewish or Muslim holidays be seen as constituting special privileges? This would be a double standard and a lack of equity.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that the concept of “racial science,” and therefore the notion of the Jewish “race”, took root in Western Europe during the 19th century? Anti-Semites adopted racial arguments as a new rationalization for their hatred of Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The theories of Jewish “racial” difference were developed long before you and me, even long before the modern sciences of physiology and genetics. Nowadays, All reputable scientists agree that, while physical traits — skin color, susceptibility to certain diseases — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals. Therefore, the idea that Jews (or any other ethnic group) are predisposed to bad or undesirable behavior because of their genetic makeup is wholly unscientific.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to recognize that the theories of Jewish “racial” difference were developed long before the modern sciences of physiology and genetics. Although today there is a scholarly debate over whether or not the term “race” has any scientific meaning, all reputable scientists are in agreement that, while physical traits — skin color, susceptibility to certain diseases — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know that there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals? Therefore, the idea that Jews (or any other ethnic group) are predisposed to bad or undesirable behavior because of their genetic makeup is wholly unscientific.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A definition of Judaism based on physical or genetic traits is misleading because Jews appear throughout the world. Jews resemble their non-Jewish neighbors in the countries from which they originate.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A definition of Judaism based on physical or genetic traits is simply wrong. Through centuries of intermarriage and conversion, Jews from Eastern Europe tend to look like Eastern Europeans; Jews from Ethiopia tend to look like Ethiopians; Jews from India tend to look like Indians. And so on and so forth.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What unites Jews as a people, whether they come from Europe, Asia, Africa, or the Americas, is a common culture, rooted in a common religion. Jews throughout the world are joined by a religious and cultural heritage rather than any alleged racial sameness.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Then, what does Jew “should” look like? What is their "physical nature"? Can a Black person be a Jew? Can an East Asian or Indian person be a Jew? What about someone born Christian and then became Jewish? Do you see that blood, religion, and malevolence are not correlated at all?

HATE_SPEECH: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Several federal reports clearly stated that there is no evidence at all that terrorists are entering through the Mexican border.

HATE_SPEECH: Undocumented immigrants sneak across the border with Mexico.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Current estimates suggest that between one third and one half of undocumented immigrants have overstayed their visas. That means that they entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal.

HATE_SPEECH: Undocumented immigrants sneak across the border with Mexico.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many undocumented immigrants that are so because they have overstayed their visas. That means that they entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal.

HATE_SPEECH: We have a criminality problem since most immigrants are here illegally. They sneak across the border with Mexico.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So what? Many more entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal, by overstaying their visas. In my opinion what should matter is how they behave, not the way they entered our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants get 35 euros per day for idling.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The 35 euros are not given directly to the migrants, but are used for their sustenance.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants get 35 euros per day for idling.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ...And from that sum, the migrant receives only 'pocket money', which amounts to 2-3 euros

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants get 35 euros per day for idling.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants do not receive 35 euros per se, this money is paid to the co-ops to cover food and accommodation during the period spent in first aid facilities

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They take on many roles (e.g. family assistant) that are extremely valuable to society

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When we give refugees and asylum seekers the opportunity to work, giving them legal access to the labor market, many of them agree to do works that Italians do not intend to do anymore. Isn't this an advantage for our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies get the priority for council houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Statistically, it almost never happens that they get the priority.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants say they are poor but they have the Iphone
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sorry, which migrants are you talking about? Not all are economic migrants, they also escape from war or persecution. If one day the situation in our country were to change and you were to feel threatened, would you leave your smartphone at home just to look like a real poor person in the country you will flee to?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants say they are poor but they have the Iphone
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Often a mobile phone is the only asset left for them.

HATE_SPEECH: Crazy black women are so unstable that even the police needs to give them a special treatment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We can identify people who are struggling with mental illness, trauma and poverty and act accordingly. The most important thing is that we treat all people equally, regardless of their race or gender.

HATE_SPEECH: I love white people! I am not interested in anyone else!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are all different and deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies steal our jobs, we don't want them back.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of Gypsy workers are proud and hard-working people. Even if some could lack good will, in my mind there is no question that they are extremely productive and hard-working people.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies steal our jobs, we don't want them back.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Work should be a right, not a privilege. Gypsies deserve every opportunity to get a job and to be paid fairly.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a huge conspiracy to run society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminist movement is a movement to end sexism. It is a part of the worldwide struggle for justice.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a waste of time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see what you're saying. Feminism is about equality, and equality is about making the most of humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a waste of time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to the UK and it is high time they left!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants come here on humanitarian grounds. They do not harm us. The right time for discrimination is never o'clock.

HATE_SPEECH: We all know it: migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Given that some studies show that some immigrants are not only good workers but also contribute to our country, this assertion of yours just isn't based upon facts..

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just a bunch of criminals, they do not deserve our hospitality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs. Why are they here? Why can't they just work in their homeland? They are all profiteers of our wealth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some immigrants come here to support their families, but that doesn't mean that they have the ability to do so at home.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems to me that you have a complaint about the lack of job opportunities rather than about migration. The more you talk about the real problems, the better off we all will be!

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the host country because they are refusing to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are happy to contribute to the host country's economic growth, in order to give back to it in many ways.

HATE_SPEECH: Our founding fathers were not happy with migration and multiculturalism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to the facts, British colonisation started around 1600. In so far as the British empire is concerned, for better or worse, we have always been in favour of multiculturalism.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a plague in the United States. They threaten our richness, even billionaires don't want them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you tried comparing the top individuals in the U.S. according to assets and liabilities? A comparison of wealth and income will reveal that the richest 1% have more wealth, exceeding the wealth of the bottom 80%. Maybe this is the real plague...

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are more likely to be criminals like all migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees aren't a 'source of crime' just because they are migrants. Moreover, they are no source of crime at all. Rather, it is very likely they are escaping from countries where crime against humanity is perpetrated.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, even if they are born here!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's place of birth is not relevant, but neither is a person's religion. Some people are Muslims. I prefer to call them what they are: people, not potential terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have always lived here. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have lived here for centuries and they are part of our community.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They are our enemies, they will always be our enemies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot say "us" and "them". We are all part of one community, united by our common humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: We have become so political correct that when anybody tries to find fault with the actions of a migrant, they are accused of 'Islamophobia'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People find fault in people of any religion. But the problem is not with religion. The problem is blaming migrants because they are Muslims. This Islamophobic climate has reached a crisis state. We must step in and stop it.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims should be welcome in every country in the world, and their faith does not make them less welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims take everything we have.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many muslims work hard to provide for their families. If we were to generalize the behaviour of some about all people, then we would be failing to understanding reality.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are less smart.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just an attempt by feminists to have it all their own way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Feminism is an attempt to improve the lot of the less fortunate. It is about equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the right to choose, no one should be forced to have an abortion or not to have it.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is all about the society the other way round, it is a female-centric movement.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's about creating more opportunities in particular for underprivileged social groups. Not about oppressing men.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality. Not the destruction of manhood.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is all about empowerment and the right of every human being to be respected and protected. It is not about denying anybody's values.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should women not have the rights that men have? Women have the right to be conscious of their rights as humans and not to feel threatened.

HATE_SPEECH: I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being in favour of a person's right to choose is not being anti-men. What is being anti-human is wanting to have an effect on someone else's personal life.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman, they are just children, they should shut up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All humans are born equal, although there is no gender equality. This means they need to raise their voice.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A couple raising a child is the most fulfilling of all tasks, and it is the duty of society to ensure that all couples can raise their children.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are dangerous.Children hould not be left alone with these animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should really avoid any comparison between animals and humans and would be better if there were no discrimination at all. Homosexual people aren't a danger to children.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.

HATE_SPEECH: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a child knows some gay people from a very early age nothing strange will happening. The idea that they can be harmed and their lives and sexual orientation are in danger is completely false.

HATE_SPEECH: All gay are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, obviously the criminal behaviour of an individual can constitute a criminal act, but being gay is not a crime. And to be honest, what is the problem if some people are homosexuals?

HATE_SPEECH: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not acceptable, to have all this faggots spreading HIV, it's not ok to tolerate this: we have to eradicate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. And it is important to note that this canard is used to persecute gay men.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As long as this strict code does not clash with our laws, Jews should be left free to practice their religion according to their conscience.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that Jews are constrained by their religion is a myth perpetuated by anti-semites and racists, who use it to justify discrimination and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

HATE_SPEECH: Being gay is an illness, a disorder, a mental issue and should be ignored.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not an illness, nor a disorder, nor a mental disorder. This is just a lack of awareness.

HATE_SPEECH: All gay people are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Stating this does not seem like a way to improve people's well-being. Homosexuals are not committing crimes. Instead, they are trying to create a climate in which people can become more accepting of other people.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals are not forcing anybody to love people of the same sex. It is up to each individual to decide whether or not they want to live as they choose.

HATE_SPEECH: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The LGBT community is often stereotyped as not 'being like other minorities' when in fact they are no different from other people. They are just dealing with prejudices and conflicts that are specific to their community.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years?

HATE_SPEECH: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People from all backgrounds are welcome here, regardless of their religious beliefs, whatever they may be.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming in droves to this country, they are the reason we are having so many islamist attacks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame all immigrants for the attacks a few carry out. It is easier, but not fair, to blame them all.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

HATE_SPEECH: Our government has allowed in many alien religions and cultures. Islam has proven to be far from beneficial to our society, and it is causing terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion is only considered harmful or 'compromised' when someone is labelled, with eyes closed, a 'terrorist' for their faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that was established to be peaceful.Apart from few extremists that remains the case.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are living in a complex and multifaceted world, and in order to understand it one needs to be part of a global community. In this respect, it is not useful to generalize in such a way.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. Muslims are not advocating violence towards anyone. We should try to understand their religion better.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology, it has no place in 21st century Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is a good idea to label people based on their religion? It is discriminatory to say this about a person's belief.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they are not integrating.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't judge people by their faith. This is just another example of xenophobia, the real problem concerning integration.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The religion of Islam is not a problem in our country. The real problem is the violent radicalisation of some Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are associated with terrorism, some are good citizens in our country. What we need instead is a strategy for de-radicalising Muslim extremists in communities.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by "a Christian society"? Are you saying that a Muslim community can't be a part of a Western society?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. Their integration is incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is the "integration" you refer to an individual problem, or can we address it collectively?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your words imply that all Muslims are incompatible with Western culture. Do you have any data to back this up?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing about any group of people you dislike?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, and not about conquering others. Muslims love all people, regardless of their religion, regardless of their culture, regardless of their history. Islam is about love, not about violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of conquest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The definition of 'religion of conquest' is a political and social construct, used to justify the forcible removal of people's rights. If you want to talk about religion, I would just say that Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies. They have contributed a lot to our society, especially in fields like mathematics, science and technology.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My optician, my dentist and my kids teachers all disagree..

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion of peace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As a matter of fact, Islam is about love, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the point in talking about "power" when everyone is equally susceptible to it? It is about time we started talking about racism and how power is used, instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants look like monkeys, maybe they are?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how coming from another country makes them any less human.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the biggest problem in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How big is the immigration problem? Do you measure it in square kilometers? I am not sure, maybe you should show me your reference for this claim.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop migrants from coming in: they are increasing crime level and they should just be all killed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you say is terrible. Such an irrational slaughter would be a crime against humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants don't want to integrate, they just want to get away with it: they should be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you suggesting that everyone should be subjected to discrimination because of their origin? Then you are certainly not representative of most people in the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bad and need to be sent back to their own country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think this statement may have more to do with what country a person is from than with who they are. Would you say the same to a migrant coming from Finland?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that migrants steal our jobs. Maybe they simply don't do the jobs you'd expect them to do?

HATE_SPEECH: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure? Even in the west, there are women who still don't have equal access to many of their rights, especially when it comes to healthcare. [https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2018/05/this-map-depicts-abortion-access-across-america-and-its-really-bleak/]

HATE_SPEECH: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While nowadays there may be fewer examples of overt oppression, that does not remove hidden oppression, nor does it mean that equality has been completely achieved.

HATE_SPEECH: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a generalization: movements which promote abuse of female power over men are just examples of toxic feminism, disapproved of by most women.

HATE_SPEECH: Woman and feminist do not want equal rights and opportunity: they aretrying to take over society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but this is wrong. Feminism - the theory of the political, economic, and social equality of the sexes - is by definition about equality, first and foremost.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights for all, but then they tends to concentrate only on Females in Western democracies \(so predominately white females\). It does little to focus on the problems and inequalities of females in Middle Eastern, African and Asian countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's something women are actively working on, and because of that there is what is called "intersectional feminism". As you can see the goal of a lot of feminists is having a movement representative of all females.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of Feminism?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since the movement is meant to achieve equality for the oppressed female population, it is called the movement for women: FEMinism. But of course the outcome will be equality.!

HATE_SPEECH: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not formally, but many are still hostile or unapproachable for women, especially in STEM fields.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development? This "mix" fosters a positive learning atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all students. This mean that children with Down syndrome would be a burden to society if isolated, not the contrary.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they foster bullying behavior in normal children. They should go to special school just for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you think that taking all of the kids with DS out of mainstream education will solve the problem, then you are wrong. Bullying won't go away until we refuse to tolerate it. Bullies will simply target other kids who are overweight; a different colour; or in a number of other ways considered to be different and, thus, a mark for bullying.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they foster bullying behavior in normal children. They should go to special school just for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If teachers and parents intervene and educate appropriately, the response could be one more of empathy than of antagonism and bullying. Don't you think? Isn't your comment just classic victim-blaming?

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with Down Syndrome should be taught in mainstream education, because diversity is an enrichment for all.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disagreement with facts does not necessitate their removal from curricula.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should not be taught about LGBT perversion. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some parents may be racist and be against teaching about slavery. That doesn't mean that subjects such as this shouldn't be truthfully covered.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should not be taught about LGBT perversion. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: By this reasoning, no subject of importance should be taught in school, because there is always someone against a certain topic.

HATE_SPEECH: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: An objective way of teaching gender to children is very important for the society and it is not imposing. We can present scientific and peer-reviewed sources and discuss stories of how people experience gender in terms of their personal identity.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only a sexist argument could cause hate from a discussion of females trying to gain more rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they can go out of their home duty, the less happy they become.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Thanks to feminism, women now have a choice between either having a family, having a career, or balancing both - which can be challenging for people to manage, of course.

HATE_SPEECH: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they depart from domestic duties , the unhappier they become.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If women are stressed about balancing family and career it is because men are still not sharing equally in the [responsibilities at home](https://www.huffingtonpost.ca/2017/09/27/women-chores-home_a_23224733/). It is not the choices that cause women stress, it is patriarchy and archaic gender roles.

HATE_SPEECH: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they can go out of their home duty, the less happy they become.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Same reasoning could be applied to men. They also have these problems, but are less likely to be personally chastised for how they make those same choices.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Obama was a pretty divisive force in society too. So were Malcolm X, Martin Luther King, Gandhi, Oppenheimer, Einstein, Caesar, etc. What is your point exactly?

HATE_SPEECH: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. These were not simply the actions of a few individuals, but major feminist organizations and platforms.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Donna Hylton had served her sentence, and once served most moral systems allow rights like freedom of speech to return.

HATE_SPEECH: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. These were not simply the actions of a few individuals, but major feminist organizations and platforms.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Bad ideas/actions of individuals in a group are not representative of the group itself, unless that group endorses those ideas/actions.

HATE_SPEECH: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. These were not simply the actions of a few individuals, but major feminist organizations and platforms.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's unreasonable to expect every individual of a movement to catch every instance of malpractice by 'official groups'. One mistake should not be cause for dismissal of an entire movement that has been historically necessary. If this really happens often, please provide more examples.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This seems like a misogynistic statement. Anti feminism groups such as women against men use logical fallacies and false claims to try and discredit feminism. For example by citing extreme feminists with points of views that nearly every other feminist would disagree with. They then use the Fallacy of composition to falsely claim that is what all feminists are like.

HATE_SPEECH: Has our political elite forgot that were Christians? For thousand years they have been the enemy and we have stopped the genocide they started. And now we encourage that? Let the warriors take care of this because this is the war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would you think it is a war? Can't we deal with it peacefully? War cannot solve problems but create chaos.

HATE_SPEECH: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How often have you read the Quran and thought about its teachings? Or is your knowledge based on selected highlights? We all know there are exerts like that in the Bible too.

HATE_SPEECH: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What have 'all' Pakistani people done to deserve deportation? Sweeping generalisations like this are divisive and fuel false fearmongering around migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are clearly not speaking on behalf of me.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Provide positive news stories about the Muslim community and promote a better understanding.

HATE_SPEECH: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you call Pakistan a disgusting country? It has its culture and values. We cannot say that every Pakistani person is a rapist. Thus, you should not insult all the Pakistani people.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not allowed to celebrate Easter as a Christian festival for fear of offending Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one is stopping you from celebrating Easter, nor are they offended by it.
